name: Ayan Kumar Bhowmick
body:
### About me
I am a Ph.D. research scholar in the [Department of Computer Science and Engineering](https://cse.iitkgp.ac.in), [IIT Kharagpur](http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/) working under the supervision of [Prof. Bivas Mitra](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/~bivasm/). I joined the department in July, 2015. My broad area of interest lies in the area of Data Science and Analysis of Online Social Networks. My research work involves the study of Information Diffusion in Online Social Networks such as Yelp and Twitter. I am a part of the [Complex Network Research Group (CNeRG)](http://www.cnergres.iitkgp.ac.in/) in IIT Kharagpur.

### Academics
* Pursuing my Ph.D. from the [Department of Computer Science and Engineering](https://cse.iitkgp.ac.in), [IIT Kharagpur](http://www.iitkgp.ac.in/) since July, 2015
* Completed my M.Tech. from the [Department of Computer Science and Technology](http://www.becs.ac.in/index.php/home-cst), [IIEST Shibpur](http://www.becs.ac.in/index.php) in June, 2015
* Completed my B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering from [St. Thomas' College of Engineering & Technology, Kolkata](http://www.stcet.org/) in June, 2011
* Passed Indian School Certificate Examination (Class XII board) from [St. Thomas' Boys' School, Kidderpore, Kolkata](http://www.stsboys.com/) in March, 2007
* Passed Indian Certificate of Secondary Examination (Class X board) from [St. Thomas' Boys' School, Kidderpore, Kolkata](http://www.stsboys.com/) in March, 2005

### Work Experience
I worked as a Programmer Analyst in [Cognizant Technology Solutions India Pvt. Ltd.](https://www.cognizant.com/) from August, 2011 to September, 2012 after completing my B.Tech. My domain of work was Information, Media and Entertainment (IME).
